product_desc:
Digital Factory (DF) is an ad-tech company with geo-location technology that can be plugged into any brand mobile application to increase consumer engagement and path to purchase.

What do we sell?
We sell increased consumer engagement, conversion and loyalty for brands through relevant, location-specific mobile content. This is due to driving increased usage and utility for a brand’s mobile app, ultimately making a brand’s mobile presence more powerful, valuable and content-rich. 

The ability to be consumer intelligent allows smartphones and data to be more precise and timely when sending notifications. Notifications pull the consumer into the app, and the consumer is reminded of the brand’s value through the receipt of brand content. These notification could include messages, videos, offers, photos or links. 


Use Case: After landing at O’Hare Airport, a consumer receives a notification through United’s app on their mobile device about the best places to shop and eat in Chicago.
high_concept: Ad-tech plugged-in an, app increasing purchase.
name: Digital Factory Inc.
